name: RelaxMyPet
0:
”Alexa, Open Relax My Pet”
”Alexa, Start Relax My Pet”
”Alexa, Launch Relax My Pet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relax my pet
des:
Listening to this music will help your pet feel more relaxed and calm, less anxious, sleep more and be generally happier. Playing this music is a great way to ensure that your best furry friend is feeling relaxed. If you are feeling a bit stressed out yourself, you will enjoy this soothing sounds yourself. It's very relaxing all around :)

The skill provides relaxing music for dogs and cats. Skill saves your music preference and defaults to the same music when you visit next time for quick access.

ROUTINE:
You can make an Alexa routine to activate Relax My Pet when you need to relax your pet. To do this, launch the Alexa app on your phone or tablet and follow the instructions:

1. Tap the hamburger icon in the upper left corner
2. Tap Routines
3. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner to open up a New Routine tab
4. Tap “When this happens” to choose the trigger. For example, your can select Voice and then type “Relax My Pet”
5. Tap “Add action” and select “Skills”
6. Tap Your skills and find the “Relax My Pet” skill in the list
7. Tap “Save” in the upper right corner to create your new routine!

When you're ready to relax, say, “Alexa, Relax My Pet”

More Info:
Relaxing Sounds: are the best music for pets. Relaxing Sleeping Music for Dogs, Cats, and Other Pets. It helps - Calm Down Your Dog, Pet Relaxation, Stress Relief, Anxiety Medication, Sleep Aids, Music Therapy for Dogs, Happy Animal, New Age Music for Puppy & Kitty, Music for Cats to Calm Down, Relaxing Music for Your Pet, Calm Your Anxious Dog, Nature Sounds for Relaxation. Music for Helps when Grooming, Restlessness.
